title: President Zuma extends condolences to Sandton tragedy victims (The Presidency of the Republic of South ...
text: ( Source : The Presidency of the Republic of South Africa ) 15 October 2015 President Jacob Zuma has extended condolences to the families of those who lost their lives yesterday, 14 October 2015, during the collapse of a bridge along the M1
